gjs-css: * { box-sizing: border-box; } body {margin: 0;}#i70hm{margin:10px 0 10px 0;}#iw7s9{margin:10px 0 10px 0;}#iepbu6{width:520px;background-color:#fff;border:1px solid #ddd;id:iepbu6;}#i97ydg{background-color:#FF9800;padding-bottom:0;id:i97ydg;padding-top:0;border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;}#i5y19{border-radius:0 0 0 0;id:i5y19;}#is5952{src:https://www.j2store.org/images/Newsletters/shopx_preview_responsive.png;padding-bottom:0;id:is5952;border-radius:6px 6px 0 0;padding-right:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0;height:auto;}#i97ydg{background-color:#FF9800;padding-bottom:0;id:i97ydg;padding-top:0;}#i93qi{border-radius:0 0 0 0;id:i93qi;}#irocgl{font-size:28px;align:center;color:#fff;line-height:1.3em;font-weight:300;font-family:Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif;id:irocgl;}#ivykpb{padding-top:20px;padding-left:20px;padding-right:20px;padding-bottom:20px;id:ivykpb;background-color:#fafafa;}#illb0m{font-size:16px;font-family:Helvetica, serif;color:#8e9197;align:center;font-weight:100;line-height:1.6em;id:illb0m;}#inzarj{href:https://www.campaignrabbit.com/;border:2px solid #FF9800;background-color:#FF9800;font-size:15px;id:inzarj;font-family:Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif;}#i1emrj{background-color:#EAECED;id:i1emrj;border-radius:0 0 6px 6px;}#i1pog1{align:center;color:rgb(157, 160, 168);text-decoration:none;id:i1pog1;}#outlook a{padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;}.ExternalClass *{line-height:100%;}body{margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;}table, td{border-collapse:collapse;}img{border-top-color:currentcolor;border-top-style:none;border-top-width:0px;border-right-color:currentcolor;border-right-style:none;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-color:currentcolor;border-bottom-style:none;border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-color:currentcolor;border-left-style:none;border-left-width:0px;border-image-outset:0;border-image-repeat:stretch;border-image-slice:100%;border-image-source:none;border-image-width:1;height:auto;line-height:100%;outline-color:currentcolor;outline-style:none;outline-width:medium;text-decoration-line:none;text-decoration-style:solid;text-decoration-color:currentcolor;}p{display:block;margin-top:13px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:13px;margin-left:0px;}
gjs-html:
Here’s a Very Important Notification

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

More tips? Check our site!

77, High Street, #09-14, High Street Plaza, Singapore - 179433
Copyright © 2018 CampaignRabbit
Unsubscribe
